pullRequest.title: RHDM-1159: Exception while coverting spreedsheet decision table to guided decision table
pullRequest.bodyText:

The XLS attached to the JIRA now converts correctly (and the User can view source).
Part of an ensemble:

#2723
kiegroup/drools-wb#1282
